Table of Contents

Interface ITagService

Namespace
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.Interfaces.Services
Assembly
NeonSuit.RSSReader.Core.dll

Service interface for tag management operations. Provides business logic, validation, and event notifications for tag operations.

public interface ITagService

Remarks

This service centralizes all tag-related business logic including:

  • Tag CRUD operations with validation and duplicate prevention
  • Tag assignment to articles with atomic batch operations
  • Tag popularity tracking and usage statistics
  • Pin/unpin functionality for frequently used tags
  • Tag merging for consolidation and cleanup

All methods return DTOs instead of entities to maintain separation of concerns.

Methods

AssignTagsToArticleAsync(int, IEnumerable<int>, CancellationToken)

Assigns multiple tags to an article in a single batch operation.

Task<List<TagDto>> AssignTagsToArticleAsync(int articleId, IEnumerable<int> tagIds, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

articleId int

The article ID.

tagIds IEnumerable<int>

The list of tag IDs to assign.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<List<TagDto>>

The list of assigned tag DTOs.

Exceptions

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if articleId is less than or equal to 0.

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if tagIds is null.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

CreateTagAsync(CreateTagDto, CancellationToken)

Creates a new tag with the specified properties.

Task<TagDto> CreateTagAsync(CreateTagDto createDto, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

createDto CreateTagDto

The DTO containing tag creation data.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<TagDto>

The created tag DTO with generated ID.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if createDto is null.

ArgumentException

Thrown if tag name is invalid or color format is invalid.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if a tag with the same name already exists.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

MergeTagsAsync(MergeTagsDto, CancellationToken)

Merges two tags, moving all article associations from source to target.

Task<TagDto> MergeTagsAsync(MergeTagsDto mergeDto, CancellationToken cancellationToken = default)

Parameters

mergeDto MergeTagsDto

The DTO containing merge information.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<TagDto>

The merged tag DTO.

Exceptions

ArgumentNullException

Thrown if mergeDto is null.

ArgumentOutOfRangeException

Thrown if either tag ID is less than or equal to 0.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if source and target are the same tag or tags not found.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

Parameters

The ID of the tag to update.

The DTO containing tag update data.

cancellationToken CancellationToken

A CancellationToken to observe while waiting for the task to complete.

Returns

Task<TagDto>

The updated tag DTO if successful; otherwise, null.

Exceptions

ArgumentException

Thrown if tag has invalid name or color format is invalid.

InvalidOperationException

Thrown if another tag with the same name already exists.

OperationCanceledException

Thrown if the operation is canceled via the cancellation token.

Events

OnTagChanged

Event triggered when a tag is created, updated, deleted, pinned, unpinned, or visibility changes.

event EventHandler<TagChangedEventArgs> OnTagChanged

Event Type

EventHandler<TagChangedEventArgs>
